roleset.name: to contaminate, contaminating of
roleset.note: POLLUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pollute' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pollute.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: At the same time , moves toward tighter air-quality standards are spurring interest in lighter or alternative fuels that [*T*-1] do n't pollute as much as fuel refined [*]from `` heavy '' crudes , generally high in sulfur .
example.arg: as much as fuel refined [*] from `` heavy '' crudes , generally high in sulfur

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Many of the mills have promised to eliminate their pollution of Maine's waters.
